message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. Our product offers unparalleled benefits and value, tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the opportunity to experience the full potential of our product. We believe this investment will greatly benefit your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the details you've provided about the product's value. However,  $1500000 is at the very top of my budget. To make this work for me, I'd need to come in at a lower price point.  I'm willing to offer $1200000 for the product.  This would allow me to move forward with the purchase and explore the benefits you've described. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
